*div1 type="summary"* *p*John Gibson to J. E. B. Austin, November 7, 1827.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Rio La Vaca*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="11-07-1827">November 7th 1827.*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir,*/p*
*p*I send a few things to the *location_mentioned*Brasos */location_mentioned*by *person_mentioned*Mr. Alley*/person_mentioned* to be stored until my arrival which will be within *date_mentioned n="11-22-1827">fifteen days from the present date*/date_mentioned*. *person_mentioned*Mr James Kerr*/person_mentioned* was good enough to give me a few Lines to you which you have in the *location_mentioned*Bundle of Letters*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*Should there be any *person_mentioned*Persons of trust*/person_mentioned* going by the way of *location_mentioned*Natchitoches */location_mentioned*to the*location_mentioned* United States*/location_mentioned* — be Pleased to forward this *location_mentioned*Packet of letters*/location_mentioned* by them to be Mailed at that Place*/p*.
*p**person_mentioned*John Gibson */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Jas. B. Austin*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*/div1*
